TestCase.name: testInvalidRowNumberConditionOnProctime
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecCalc(select=[a, 2 AS rank_num]) +- StreamExecRank(rankFunction=[ROW_NUMBER], partitionBy=[b], orderBy=[proctime DESC], rankRange=[rankStart=2, rankEnd=2], strategy=[AppendFastRank], select=[*]) +- StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[b]]) +- StreamExecCalc(select=[a, b, proctime]) +- StreamExecDataStreamScan(table=[[builtin, default, _DataStreamTable_0]])

TestCase.name: testInvalidRowNumberConditionOnRowtime
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecCalc(select=[a, 3 AS rank_num]) +- StreamExecRank(rankFunction=[ROW_NUMBER], partitionBy=[b], orderBy=[rowtime DESC], rankRange=[rankStart=3, rankEnd=3], strategy=[AppendFastRank], select=[*]) +- StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[b]]) +- StreamExecCalc(select=[a, b, rowtime]) +- StreamExecDataStreamScan(table=[[builtin, default, _DataStreamTable_0]])

TestCase.name: testSimpleFirstRowOnProctime
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecCalc(select=[a, b, c]) +- StreamExecFirstLastRow(key=[a], select=[a, b, c, proctime], order=[PROCTIME], mode=[FirstRow]) +- StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) +- StreamExecCalc(select=[a, b, c, proctime]) +- StreamExecDataStreamScan(table=[[builtin, default, _DataStreamTable_0]])

TestCase.name: testSimpleLastRowOnRowtime
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecCalc(select=[a, b, c]) +- StreamExecRank(rankFunction=[ROW_NUMBER], partitionBy=[a], orderBy=[rowtime DESC], rankRange=[rankStart=1, rankEnd=1], strategy=[AppendFastRank], select=[*]) +- StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) +- StreamExecCalc(select=[a, b, c, rowtime]) +- StreamExecDataStreamScan(table=[[builtin, default, _DataStreamTable_0]])

TestCase.name: testSimpleFirstRowOnRowtime
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecCalc(select=[a, b, c]) +- StreamExecRank(rankFunction=[ROW_NUMBER], partitionBy=[a], orderBy=[rowtime ASC], rankRange=[rankStart=1, rankEnd=1], strategy=[AppendFastRank], select=[*]) +- StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) +- StreamExecCalc(select=[a, b, c, rowtime]) +- StreamExecDataStreamScan(table=[[builtin, default, _DataStreamTable_0]])

TestCase.name: testSimpleLastRowOnProctime
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecCalc(select=[a, b, c, PROCTIME(proctime) AS proctime, rowtime, 1 AS rank_num]) +- StreamExecCalc(select=[a, b, c, proctime, rowtime, 1 AS rk]) +- StreamExecFirstLastRow(key=[a], select=[a, b, c, proctime, rowtime], order=[PROCTIME], mode=[LastRow]) +- StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) +- StreamExecDataStreamScan(table=[[builtin, default, _DataStreamTable_0]])
